text:
NARRATOR: TBS and
Patron Tequila present

how to enjoy the second season
of "Search Party" responsibly.

I'm Igor Zukowiec and
I'm going to show you
how to make the Bloody Maria.

You will need two ounces
of Patron Silver, five
ounces of a Bloody Mary mix.

Prepare your glass by adding
a little salt on the rim.

Don't shake it, but roll
the cocktail by pouring
it from one thing to another.

Once the cocktail
is nice and chilled,

Finally garnish the
cocktail with a celery stick

The ultimate bloody cocktail
for the ultimate bloody branch.

Patron Tequila adds a perfect
twist to every murder mystery.

NARRATOR: Brought to
you by Patron Tequila.
